    • Method Detail

      • getMenuRootView

        public javafx.scene.layout.Pane getMenuRootView()

      • initialize

        public void initialize()

      • handlePlaylistBtnClick

        private void handlePlaylistBtnClick()

      • handleOptionsBtnClick

        private void handleOptionsBtnClick()

      • handlePlayBtnClick

        private void handlePlayBtnClick()

      • handleAddSongsBtnClick

        private void handleAddSongsBtnClick()
        When the button "Add Songs" is clicked a system default window opens. The user selects a directory, a start point to look for mp3 files in the folder and its subfolders. Finally a playlist is created.

      • handleClearPlaylistBtnClick

        private void handleClearPlaylistBtnClick()
        When the button "Clear Playlist" is clicked the m3u playlist file and the playlist songs array are cleared.

      • handlePlaylistStatusChanges

        private void handlePlaylistStatusChanges()
        Reacts to changes in the m3u playlist file status. If is empty, tells the playlist view controller to display the view with an instruction text. If is filled, tells the playlist view controller to display the playlist view with the songs and infos.

      • handleSongsArrayChanges

        private void handleSongsArrayChanges()

      • switchSelectionBoxView

        public void switchSelectionBoxView(java.lang.String newSelectionBoxView)
        Triggered by the playlist and options buttons. Switches the center view of the BorderPane that composes the selection box, between playlist and option view.
        Parameters:
        newSelectionBoxView - String with the name of the new view.
